briefTitle: An Open-label Study to Evaluate the Effect of Treatment With Romosozumab or Teriparatide in Postmenopausal Women
officialTitle: An Open-label, Randomized, Teriparatide-controlled Study to Evaluate the Effect of Treatment With Romosozumab in Postmenopausal Women With Osteoporosis Previously Treated With Bisphosphonate Therapy
summary: The primary objective of the study was to evaluate the effect of 12 months of treatment with romosozumab compared with teriparatide on total hip bone mineral density (BMD) in postmenopausal women with osteoporosis who were previously treated with bisphosphonate therapy.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percent Change From Baseline Through Month 12 in Total Hip Bone Mineral Density (BMD)
